001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages;
002
003import com.google.common.base.Preconditions;
004import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.PumpStateSupplier;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.UnexpectedOpCodeException;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.UnexpectedTransactionIdException;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.JavaHelpers;
012import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.L;
013
014import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.Hex;
015
016import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
017import java.util.Arrays;
018
019import kotlin.jvm.internal.Intrinsics;
020import kotlin.text.Charsets;
021
022public class PacketArrayList {
023    protected static final String TAG = "PacketArrayList";
024    public static final String IGNORE_INVALID_HMAC = "IGNORE_HMAC_SIGNATURE_EXCEPTION";
025    public static boolean ignoreInvalidTxId = false;
026
027    protected byte expectedOpCode;
028    protected byte expectedCargoSize;
029    protected int actualExpectedCargoSize;
030    protected byte expectedTxId;
031    protected boolean isSigned;
032    protected byte[] fullCargo;
033    protected byte[] messageData;
034
035    protected byte firstByteMod15;
036    protected byte opCode;
037    protected boolean empty = true;
038    protected final byte[] expectedCrc = {0, 0};
039
040    protected PacketArrayList(byte expectedopCode, byte expectedCargoSize, byte expectedTxId, boolean isSigned) {
041        Preconditions.checkArgument(expectedopCode != 0);
042        Preconditions.checkArgument(expectedCargoSize >= 0 || (256 + (int)expectedCargoSize) >= 0);
043        this.expectedCargoSize = expectedCargoSize;
044        if (expectedCargoSize < 0 && expectedCargoSize > -128) {
045            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 256 + expectedCargoSize;
046        } else {
047            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = expectedCargoSize;
048        }
049        this.expectedOpCode = expectedopCode;
050        this.expectedTxId = expectedTxId;
051        this.isSigned = isSigned;
052        this.fullCargo = new byte[(this.actualExpectedCargoSize + 2)];
053        this.messageData = new byte[3];
054    }
055
056    // Returns either PacketArrayList or StreamPacketArrayList depending on the opcode
057    public static PacketArrayList build(byte expectedopCode, Characteristic characteristic, byte expectedCargoSize, byte expectedTxId, boolean isSigned) {
058        Class<? extends Message> messageClass = Messages.fromOpcode(expectedopCode, characteristic);
059        L.d(TAG, String.format("queried messageClass for expectedOpcode %d, %s: expectedCargoSize=%d", expectedopCode, messageClass, expectedCargoSize));
060        MessageProps messageProps = messageClass.getAnnotation(MessageProps.class);
061        if (messageProps.stream()) {
062            return new StreamPacketArrayList(expectedopCode, expectedCargoSize, expectedTxId, isSigned);
063        }
064
065        return new PacketArrayList(expectedopCode, expectedCargoSize, expectedTxId, isSigned);
066    }
067
068    public byte[] messageData() {
069        return messageData;
070    }
071
072    public byte opCode() {
073        return opCode;
074    }
075
076    public final boolean needsMorePacket() {
077        byte b = this.firstByteMod15;
078        return b >= 0;
079    }
080
081    private void createExpectedCrc() {
082        if (this.fullCargo.length >= 2) {
083            System.arraycopy(this.fullCargo, this.fullCargo.length - 2, this.expectedCrc, 0, 2);
084        }
085    }
086
087    public boolean validate(byte[] authKey) {
088        Intrinsics.checkParameterIsNotNull(authKey, "ak");
089        if (needsMorePacket()) {
090            return false;
091        }
092        createMessageData();
093        createExpectedCrc();
094        byte[] a = Bytes.calculateCRC16(this.messageData);
095        byte[] lastTwoB = this.expectedCrc;
096        boolean ok = true;
097
098        if (!(a[0] == lastTwoB[0] && a[1] == lastTwoB[1])) {
099            ok = false;
100        }
101        // the fullCargo size is 2 + the message length.
102        L.d(TAG, "validate fullCargo size="+fullCargo.length+" ok="+ok);
103        if (!ok) {
104            if (shouldIgnoreInvalidHmac(authKey)) {
105                L.e(TAG, "CRC validation failed for: " + ((int) this.expectedOpCode) + ". a: " + Hex.encodeHexString(a) + " lastTwoB: " + Hex.encodeHexString(lastTwoB) + ". fullCargo len=" + fullCargo.length + " opCode="+opCode);
106            } else {
107                throw new InvalidCRCException("CRC validation failed for: " + ((int) this.expectedOpCode) + ". a: " + Hex.encodeHexString(a) + " lastTwoB: " + Hex.encodeHexString(lastTwoB) + ". fullCargo len=" + fullCargo.length + " opCode="+opCode+" authKey="+new String(authKey));
108            }
109        } else if (this.isSigned) {
110            L.d(TAG, "validate(" + Hex.encodeHexString(authKey) + ") messageData: " + Hex.encodeHexString(messageData) + " len: " + messageData.length + " fullCargo: " + Hex.encodeHexString(fullCargo) + " len: " + fullCargo.length);
111            byte[] byteArray = Bytes.dropLastN(this.messageData, 20);
112            byte[] bArr2 = this.messageData;
113            byte[] expectedHmac = Bytes.dropFirstN(bArr2, bArr2.length - 20);
114            byte[] hmacSha = Packetize.doHmacSha1(byteArray, authKey);
115            if (!Arrays.equals(expectedHmac, hmacSha)) {
116                L.e(TAG, "Pump response invalid signature: expectedHmac=" + Hex.encodeHexString(expectedHmac)+" hmacSha="+Hex.encodeHexString(hmacSha));
117                if (shouldIgnoreInvalidHmac(authKey)) {
118                    return true;
119                }
120
121
122                throw new InvalidSignedMessageHMACSignatureException("Pump response invalid: SIGNATURE");
123            }
124        }
125        return ok;
126    }
127
128    protected void createMessageData() {
129        byte[] bArr = this.messageData;
130        bArr[0] = this.expectedOpCode;
131        bArr[1] = this.expectedTxId;
132        bArr[2] = this.expectedCargoSize;
133        this.messageData = Bytes.combine(bArr, Bytes.dropLastN(this.fullCargo, 2));
134    }
135
136    protected void parse(byte[] bArr) {
137        byte opCode = bArr[2];
138        int cargoSize = bArr[4];
139        if (cargoSize < 0 && cargoSize > -128) {
140            cargoSize += 256;
141        }
142        // ErrorResponse handling. Can have a dynamic cargo size in different situations.
143        if (77 == opCode && 2 == cargoSize) {
144            this.expectedOpCode = 77;
145            this.expectedCargoSize = 2;
146            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 2;
147            this.fullCargo = new byte[4];
148        } else if (77 == opCode && 26 == cargoSize) {
149            this.expectedOpCode = 77;
150            this.expectedCargoSize = 26;
151            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 26;
152            this.fullCargo = new byte[28];
153        }
154        // ApiVersionRequest can either have 0 cargo size or 2
155        // its cargo size is set as 2 in the MessageProps but we allow the 0-cargo here as well
156        if (32 == opCode && 0 == cargoSize) {
157            this.expectedCargoSize = 0;
158            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 0;
159        }
160        // CommonSoftwareInfoRequest can have cargo size 0 or 1
161        else if (-114 == opCode && 1 == cargoSize) {
162            this.expectedCargoSize = 1;
163            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 1;
164        }
165        // CommonSoftwareInfoResponse can have cargo size 60 or 51
166        else if (-113 == opCode && 51 == cargoSize) {
167            this.expectedCargoSize = 51;
168            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 51;
169        }
170
171
172
173        if (opCode == this.expectedOpCode) {
174            this.firstByteMod15 = (byte) (bArr[0] & 15);
175            this.opCode = bArr[2];
176            byte txId = bArr[3];
177            L.d(TAG, "PacketArrayList firstByteMod15="+firstByteMod15+" opCode="+opCode+" txId="+txId+" expectedTxId="+expectedTxId+" bArr="+JavaHelpers.display(bArr));
178            if (txId != this.expectedTxId) {
179                throwUnexpectedTransactionIdException(txId);
180            } else if (cargoSize != this.actualExpectedCargoSize) {
181                if (cargoSize == this.actualExpectedCargoSize + 24 && isSigned) {
182                    L.i(TAG, "adding +24 expectedCargoSize for already signed request which contains an existing trailer");
183                    expectedCargoSize += 24;
184                    actualExpectedCargoSize += 24;
185                } else {
186                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unexpected cargo size: " + ((int) cargoSize) + ", expecting " + ((int) this.actualExpectedCargoSize) + " for opCode="+opCode);
187                }
188            }
189            this.fullCargo = Bytes.dropFirstN(bArr, 5);
190        } else {
191            throw new UnexpectedOpCodeException(opCode, this.expectedOpCode);
192        }
193        L.d(TAG, "PacketArrayParse ok: opCode="+opCode+" firstByteMod15="+firstByteMod15+" cargoSize="+cargoSize);
194    }
195
196
197    public void validatePacket(byte[] packetData) {
198        Intrinsics.checkParameterIsNotNull(packetData, "packetData");
199        if (packetData.length == 0) {
200            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Empty data");
201        } else if (packetData.length >= 3) {
202            byte firstByteMod15 = (byte) (packetData[0] & 15);
203            byte secondByte = packetData[1];
204            L.d(TAG, "Found tx id: "+secondByte+" expected "+this.expectedTxId);
205            if (secondByte == this.expectedTxId) {
206                if (this.empty) {
207                    this.firstByteMod15 = firstByteMod15;
208                    L.d(TAG, "txid matches, firstByteMod15="+firstByteMod15+", parsing packetData");
209                    parse(packetData);
210                } else if (((byte) 0) == firstByteMod15) {
211                    L.d(TAG, "firstByteMod15=0");
212                    if (this.firstByteMod15 == firstByteMod15) {
213                        this.fullCargo = Bytes.combine(this.fullCargo, Bytes.dropFirstN(packetData, 2));
214                        L.d(TAG, "firstByteMod15 matches expected, fullCargo="+ Hex.encodeHexString(fullCargo));
215                    } else {
216                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unexpected packets remaining 3: " + ((int) firstByteMod15) + ", expected " + ((int) this.firstByteMod15) + ", opCode: " + ((int) this.expectedOpCode));
217                    }
218                } else if (this.firstByteMod15 == firstByteMod15) {
219                    this.fullCargo = Bytes.combine(this.fullCargo, Bytes.dropFirstN(packetData, 2));
220                    L.d(TAG, "firstByteMod15 matches expected, nonzero, fullCargo=" + Hex.encodeHexString(fullCargo));
221                } else {
222                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unexpected packets remaining 2: " + ((int) firstByteMod15) + ", expected " + ((int) this.firstByteMod15) + ", opCode: " + ((int) this.expectedOpCode));
223                }
224                this.empty = false;
225                this.firstByteMod15 = (byte) (this.firstByteMod15 - 1);
226                L.d(TAG, "validatePacket: decrementing firstByteMod15 to " + firstByteMod15);
227                return;
228            }
229            throwUnexpectedTransactionIdException(secondByte);
230        } else {
231            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid data size: " + packetData.length);
232        }
233    }
234
235    private void throwUnexpectedTransactionIdException(byte foundTxId) {
236        RuntimeException ex = new UnexpectedTransactionIdException(foundTxId, this.expectedTxId, this.expectedOpCode);
237        if (ignoreInvalidTxId) {
238            L.e(TAG, ex);
239            return;
240        }
241        throw ex;
242    }
243
244    private boolean shouldIgnoreInvalidHmac(byte[] authKey) {
245        return Arrays.equals(
246                Arrays.copyOfRange(authKey, 0, IGNORE_INVALID_HMAC.length()),
247                Arrays.copyOfRange(IGNORE_INVALID_HMAC.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8), 0, IGNORE_INVALID_HMAC.length())
248        );
249    }
250
251    public String toString() {
252        return JavaHelpers.autoToString(this, ImmutableSet.of());
253    }
254
255    public static class InvalidCRCException extends RuntimeException {
256        InvalidCRCException(String message) {
257            super(message);
258        }
259    }
260
261    public static class InvalidSignedMessageHMACSignatureException extends RuntimeException {
262        InvalidSignedMessageHMACSignatureException(String message) {
263            super(message);
264        }
265    }
266}
